title: Bug 7945 - Search Results Not Selected in External Jar
description: In Build 200201151, there is an issue where search results are not automatically selected when searching for references to a field in an external JAR.
OB: When searching for references to the field, the search results are not automatically selected.
EB: The expected behavior is that you should get 3 matches in the method 'getTempDir()' when searching for references in an external JAR.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Make sure you have JDK 1.3.1 set as the default JRE and ensure you have the source for rt.jar.
2. Open the 'java.io.File' class.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Search for references to this field.
5. Observe that the search results are not automatically selected as they should be.
6. Verify that you should get 3 matches in the method 'getTempDir()'.
